response.explain: The error occurred because the fridge object was not registered before being used in the action function. The registration of the fridge object was missing in the previous code.

(2) Grasp the cheese tart from the plate.
(3) Open the fridge.
(4) Put the cheese tart inside the fridge.
(5) Close the fridge.
